transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes. Good morning, sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Uh, sir, mera naam Komal hai. Main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji Komal ji boliye.
Executive: Uh, sir aapne kal ek feedback diya tha ki you are not happy with the TrustSeal services.
Customer: Right.
Executive: What kind of problem you are facing?
Customer: What's the listing? No, actually I have mentioned over there actually I'm not I'm not happy with your TrustSeal services. Right? That means ki when I have taken that services so I'm not getting the relevant leads. So why I have taken this services? I have taken this services for the better opportunity, for the better services.
Executive: So basically you are saying that you are not getting the relevant buyleads the way you wanted, right?
Customer: Exactly. Right, correct, correct. As per my as per my category. I have mentioned there are three category like e-commerce and MLM and third one is a billing software. So I am getting the leads but that is not a relevant as per our category.
Executive: Uh, just give me a minute.
Customer: And in this month, in this month I didn't I didn't get any single like uh hot lead.
Executive: Hot leads basically you are not getting hot leads.
Customer: Right. That is the totally irrelevant. I'm not getting single business in this month and previous when I have taken the like your MDC plan so I got the three two or three business in every month.
Executive: Uh.
Customer: And in this month I have passed 10 to what is the date? 11. So I have passed 11 days but I didn't get single business after having TrustSeal services.
Executive: Uh, we have added the categories where you wanted like we have scheduled a video meet, right?
Customer: Ma'am I have done all the things. I have done the I have done all the things whatever you have guided and your team is guided. So but but now I'm not getting relevant openings. So you will have to work on that.
Executive: So basically I have done all the things. You can you can you can check my website, you can check my catalog. What what is the missing over there but I have updated all the things like images, content, description, whatever you have told me. But after that I'm not getting so why I have taken this services?
Executive: Sir, basically uh the category we have added in your catalog uh on on that basis you will get the buyleads and the categories added by
Customer: What No no actually just listen to me ma'am. I I don't have much more time to discuss with you. Actually just try to understand why you have paid 50,000 60,000 rupees. Why I have paid? For the business, for the better business. Right? But earlier I was getting some business from your side but now after having that service I'm not getting single rupees business from your side. So why I need this business? Why I need this your plan? So that's only reason I have given you feedback. I'm not interested in your uh current services. So and if you are if you want to work on the services with us so so I need business from your side otherwise I will cancel as soon as possible. I'm I'm checking only for this month.
Executive: Sir, TrustSeal. Yes, after this month I I will cancel after actually ma'am as per your colleague like Mr. Taufiq. He told me sir you will get lots of notification you will get a lots of calls from uh from client side and you will get the like uh what what is service category view services but I'm not getting single calls single category view option.
Customer: Sir, you are getting direct inquiries.
Customer: I'm not getting single direct inquiry. I'm not getting relevant leads that is my problem. Please fix it and call me back. After don't try to ma'am ma'am Miss Komal ma'am just try to understand I will not convince with you with your team. I want business that's it.
Executive: Sir, I got your point.
Customer: I have paid I have paid for the business. I I don't have paid for the communication communicating with you with your team. I have paid for the business for the relevant lead.
Executive: Sir, I got your point. The thing is I am saying that you are getting the relevant buyleads. You have to check.
Customer: Already I have mentioned over there. Already I have mentioned over there each and everything. If fix it then call me back. Actually I'm not getting relevant openings uh like like your uh catalog whatever you are telling me leads.
Executive: I'm I'm telling you about the queries direct inquiries you are getting from the client. You have uh uh there is a inquiry about software solution services from Reju uh on the on uh 6th November. Have you called him?
Customer: I called. I called but he is not interested. He cut the my call.
Customer: Yesterday yes sir. So on Sunday on Sunday I have picked more than six six inquiries, right? You can check you can check my portal. Uh on Sunday I have picked more than six lead and I called each and everyone but they are they are saying sir I'm not interested. I'm not interested. So actually uh just I was trying for the for this uh like a category. I I'm trying. I'm trying. So what is this? I want hot lead.
Executive: Okay, I got your point, sir.
Customer: You can madam Komal just you check my check my portal what am I doing on your portal? Am I following your rule? I am not following your rule. You can check my portal. Everyone every day every time I'm checking your portal. I'm checking your portal is there any leads or not I'm checking each and every I am calling to everyone in in night 10:30 10:00 o'clock when I I get the lead from your side so immediately I'm calling to customer. After that ma'am they are not converting in a business so.
Executive: Uh, sir in which location you want to be?
Customer: Actually I don't have problem in location. I want did only for from anywhere. So if you want to categorize the location so I am interested for the Maharashtra.
Executive: Maharashtra. Okay, I will check and share the buyleads on your WhatsApp. Just give me a minute.
Customer: Okay, fine. Thank you so much. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting relevant leads from TrustSeal services.

- Wants hot leads as per category.

- Wants business or will cancel subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive will check and share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive added the categories as per requirement.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

cancel

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, subscription, cancellation
